#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{   char ch[100010];
    long long int i,j,len,a,b,t;
    cin>>ch;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {  cin>>a>>b;
       len=strlen(ch);
       i=(a-1)%len;
       j=(b-1)%len;
       if(ch[i]==ch[j])
       {  cout<<"Yes"<<endl; }
       else
       {  cout<<"No"<<endl;  }
    }
    //system("pause");
    return 0;
}
